def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) * (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) // (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds + (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return probability_of_winning * payoff_odds * (1 - probability_of_winning) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds + 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds * 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning / payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning + payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning ** payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 + probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - 1 * probability_of_winning) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 2)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 0)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 0)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - -1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (2 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (0 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (0 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)

def kelly_criterion(bankroll, probability_of_winning, payoff_odds):
    return (probability_of_winning * payoff_odds - (-1 - probability_of_winning)) / (payoff_odds - 1)
